description: The procurement request is for office furniture category 6. The contract value is not specified. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on July 19, 2024 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Sponsor Government Entity
 [html-link text="Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)" url](https://www.canada.ca/fr/services/public-works/gouvernement.html)
 
## Procurement ID
 *Documentation No:* WS4643285405-Doc4655198815 
## Procurement Description
 Offers are invited for the General Workspace CAT 6 Old-C 60 Queen contract. This tender seeks the delivery of Office furniture (#56101700) specifically for Category Office furniture.

## Notice Information
 *Notice Type: * Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
 *Procurement Method: * Competitive - Selective tendering
 *Expiry Date: * July 19, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. **Upon expiration, this RFP will no longer be available for bidding.**
 
## Evaluation and Award Criteria
 Offers will be evaluated on the basis of **PRICE** and criteria listed below:
 **Technical criteria**: 
 ** Price**: The lowest price submission will be awarded the contract.

## Trade Agreements
 *Government of Canada's trade agreements*: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Delivery and Regions
 Deliverables will be accepted nationally in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Contact
##Person in Charge**   King Quan, Director, Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). *Address: *None*; *Contact Email: *  King.Quan@tspgc.gc.ca.** 

## Resources and Information
 All relevant documentation, instructions and bid submission uploaded, can be accessed via [the Canadian Trade Registry link](<https://export-dev.fedwargaret.gc.ca/cgi-bin/wstate/EChRIGHLIGHTDETAILS>D).

**[ attach pertinent documentation and bid submission uploaded  ]**

Is the tender call closed?
Upon the expiration of the Invitation to bid, it shall no longer be available for bidding and therefore will be closed.

How many opens certificates are required?
One open certificate accepted as per the requirement.

Is there any embodied values to mention?**
